00045 typedef struct {
00046 
00048     // REQUIRED FIELDS - users should set these
00050     
00052     const xed_decoded_inst_t* p;
00053 
00055     char* buf;
00056 
00058     int blen;
00059 
00061     // OPTIONAL FIELDS - user can set these
00063

00068 
00071     xed_disassembly_callback_fn_t disassembly_callback;
00072 
00074     void* context; 
00075

00078 
00081     int format_options_valid;

00083 
00084

00088

00091     
00093     unsigned int operand_indx;
00094     
00096     unsigned int skip_operand;
00097 
00099     xed_reg_enum_t extra_index_operand; // for MPX
00100 
00101 } xed_print_info_t;
